attributes.action: Give tax exemption for life! for all military service men & women who have completed their service!
attributes.additional_details: I would like the goverment to adjust the covenant to the armed forces to include a tax exemption for all military men & women who have completed their service. This exemption would run from the day of their discharge until death. This exemption would also include VAT,Council tax & national insurance. As a thank you for their service and sacrifice. this is the least that could be done seeing as they all risk body & soul in the defence of this nation and its allies!
